title: André Rasenberg
text:
Adriaan "André" Rasenberg (June 17, 1914 – December 24, 1994) was a Dutch <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936 Summer Olympics</a>.
He was born in <a href="Oosterhout">Oosterhout</a> and died in <a href="Breda">Breda</a>.
In 1936 he was eliminated in the first round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201936%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20lightweight">lightweight class</a> after losing his fight to <a href="Kosta%20Hakim">Kosta Hakim</a>.
